entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
